page.title: 04The Rising Sun
page.content: The Rising Sun is on the A530 Nantwich to Middlewich road. It is about 250 years old and has always been a pub.It was used as a stopping place for stagecoaches. The hotel is owned by Greenall Whitley brewery and is leased out for a period of 21 years.A new manager has just taken over and is making changes.An extension is being built to increase the the size and improve facilities and it is inteneded to increase trade. An old fashioned railway signal will be used outside to show when the pub is open. In 1950 a man went to the pub with a friend and liked it so much that he has been going there regularly ever since.
